variable.name: cfg_legacy_exec

value.description: Do not execute config.cfg and frontend.cfg in gamedir ever.
Execute config.cfg and frontend.cfg in gamedir (unless gamedir = qw) like
Execute config.cfg and frontend.cfg even if gamedir = qw.
Execute config.cfg and frontend.cfg even if gamedir = qw.

variable.remarks:
qw 2.33.
If there is no config.cfg or frontend.cfg in gamedir, and gamedir != qw then try executing config.cfg and frontend.cfg in qw.
